title: The War of Ages
description: The war that started it all...  Gaia is a powerful mage.  Her greatest honor comes from protecting the royal elemental dragons.  But one night will change everything.  Gaia will be forced to pick a side between the one she loves and the vow she made to the dragons.  Either wayâ€”it means war.  Fans of Stephanie Meyer, Sabaa Tahir, and Sara J. Maas will devour this epic fantasy adventure.  One-click to meet the dragons today.
author: L.J. Andrews
